00043 btDefaultCollisionConfiguration::btDefaultCollisionConfiguration(const btDefaultCollisionConstructionInfo& constructionInfo)
00044 //btDefaultCollisionConfiguration::btDefaultCollisionConfiguration(btStackAlloc*        stackAlloc,btPoolAllocator*     persistentManifoldPool,btPoolAllocator* collisionAlgorithmPool)
00045 {
00046 
00047     void* mem = NULL;
00048         if (constructionInfo.m_useEpaPenetrationAlgorithm)
00049         {
00050                 mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btGjkEpaPenetrationDepthSolver),16);
00051                 m_pdSolver = new (mem)btGjkEpaPenetrationDepthSolver;
00052         }else
00053         {
00054                 mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btMinkowskiPenetrationDepthSolver),16);
00055                 m_pdSolver = new (mem)btMinkowskiPenetrationDepthSolver;
00056         }
00057         
00058         //default CreationFunctions, filling the m_doubleDispatch table
00059         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btConvexConvexAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00060         m_convexConvexCreateFunc = new(mem) btConvexConvexAlgorithm::CreateFunc(m_pdSolver);
00061         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btConvexConcaveCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00062         m_convexConcaveCreateFunc = new (mem)btConvexConcaveCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc;
00063         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btConvexConcaveCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00064         m_swappedConvexConcaveCreateFunc = new (mem)btConvexConcaveCollisionAlgorithm::SwappedCreateFunc;
00065         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00066         m_compoundCreateFunc = new (mem)btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc;
00067 
00068         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00069         m_compoundCompoundCreateFunc = new (mem)btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc;
00070 
00071         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::SwappedCreateFunc),16);
00072         m_swappedCompoundCreateFunc = new (mem)btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::SwappedCreateFunc;
00073         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btEmptyAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00074         m_emptyCreateFunc = new(mem) btEmptyAlgorithm::CreateFunc;
00075         
00076         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btSphereSphereCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00077         m_sphereSphereCF = new(mem) btSphereSphereCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc;
00078 #ifdef USE_BUGGY_SPHERE_BOX_ALGORITHM
00079         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btSphereBoxCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00080         m_sphereBoxCF = new(mem) btSphereBoxCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc;
00081         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btSphereBoxCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00082         m_boxSphereCF = new (mem)btSphereBoxCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc;
00083         m_boxSphereCF->m_swapped = true;
00084 #endif //USE_BUGGY_SPHERE_BOX_ALGORITHM
00085 
00086         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btSphereTriangleCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00087         m_sphereTriangleCF = new (mem)btSphereTriangleCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc;
00088         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btSphereTriangleCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00089         m_triangleSphereCF = new (mem)btSphereTriangleCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc;
00090         m_triangleSphereCF->m_swapped = true;
00091         
00092         mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btBoxBoxCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00093         m_boxBoxCF = new(mem)btBoxBoxCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc;
00094 
00095         //convex versus plane
00096         mem = btAlignedAlloc (sizeof(btConvexPlaneCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00097         m_convexPlaneCF = new (mem) btConvexPlaneCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc;
00098         mem = btAlignedAlloc (sizeof(btConvexPlaneCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc),16);
00099         m_planeConvexCF = new (mem) btConvexPlaneCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc;
00100         m_planeConvexCF->m_swapped = true;
00101         
00103         int maxSize = sizeof(btConvexConvexAlgorithm);
00104         int maxSize2 = sizeof(btConvexConcaveCollisionAlgorithm);
00105         int maxSize3 = sizeof(btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm);
00106         int maxSize4 = sizeof(btCompoundCompoundCollisionAlgorithm);
00107 
00108         int     collisionAlgorithmMaxElementSize = btMax(maxSize,constructionInfo.m_customCollisionAlgorithmMaxElementSize);
00109         collisionAlgorithmMaxElementSize = btMax(collisionAlgorithmMaxElementSize,maxSize2);
00110         collisionAlgorithmMaxElementSize = btMax(collisionAlgorithmMaxElementSize,maxSize3);
00111         collisionAlgorithmMaxElementSize = btMax(collisionAlgorithmMaxElementSize,maxSize4);
00112                 
00113         if (constructionInfo.m_persistentManifoldPool)
00114         {
00115                 m_ownsPersistentManifoldPool = false;
00116                 m_persistentManifoldPool = constructionInfo.m_persistentManifoldPool;
00117         } else
00118         {
00119                 m_ownsPersistentManifoldPool = true;
00120                 void* mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btPoolAllocator),16);
00121                 m_persistentManifoldPool = new (mem) btPoolAllocator(sizeof(btPersistentManifold),constructionInfo.m_defaultMaxPersistentManifoldPoolSize);
00122         }
00123         
00124         collisionAlgorithmMaxElementSize = (collisionAlgorithmMaxElementSize+16)&0xffffffffffff0;
00125         if (constructionInfo.m_collisionAlgorithmPool)
00126         {
00127                 m_ownsCollisionAlgorithmPool = false;
00128                 m_collisionAlgorithmPool = constructionInfo.m_collisionAlgorithmPool;
00129         } else
00130         {
00131                 m_ownsCollisionAlgorithmPool = true;
00132                 void* mem = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btPoolAllocator),16);
00133                 m_collisionAlgorithmPool = new(mem) btPoolAllocator(collisionAlgorithmMaxElementSize,constructionInfo.m_defaultMaxCollisionAlgorithmPoolSize);
00134         }
00135 
00136 
00137 }

00139 btDefaultCollisionConfiguration::~btDefaultCollisionConfiguration()
00140 {
00141         if (m_ownsCollisionAlgorithmPool)
00142         {
00143                 m_collisionAlgorithmPool->~btPoolAllocator();
00144                 btAlignedFree(m_collisionAlgorithmPool);
00145         }
00146         if (m_ownsPersistentManifoldPool)
00147         {
00148                 m_persistentManifoldPool->~btPoolAllocator();
00149                 btAlignedFree(m_persistentManifoldPool);
00150         }
00151 
00152         m_convexConvexCreateFunc->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00153         btAlignedFree(  m_convexConvexCreateFunc);
00154 
00155         m_convexConcaveCreateFunc->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00156         btAlignedFree( m_convexConcaveCreateFunc);
00157         m_swappedConvexConcaveCreateFunc->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00158         btAlignedFree( m_swappedConvexConcaveCreateFunc);
00159 
00160         m_compoundCreateFunc->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00161         btAlignedFree( m_compoundCreateFunc);
00162 
00163         m_compoundCompoundCreateFunc->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00164         btAlignedFree(m_compoundCompoundCreateFunc);
00165 
00166         m_swappedCompoundCreateFunc->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00167         btAlignedFree( m_swappedCompoundCreateFunc);
00168 
00169         m_emptyCreateFunc->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00170         btAlignedFree( m_emptyCreateFunc);
00171 
00172         m_sphereSphereCF->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00173         btAlignedFree( m_sphereSphereCF);
00174 
00175 #ifdef USE_BUGGY_SPHERE_BOX_ALGORITHM
00176         m_sphereBoxCF->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00177         btAlignedFree( m_sphereBoxCF);
00178         m_boxSphereCF->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00179         btAlignedFree( m_boxSphereCF);
00180 #endif //USE_BUGGY_SPHERE_BOX_ALGORITHM
00181 
00182         m_sphereTriangleCF->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00183         btAlignedFree( m_sphereTriangleCF);
00184         m_triangleSphereCF->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00185         btAlignedFree( m_triangleSphereCF);
00186         m_boxBoxCF->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00187         btAlignedFree( m_boxBoxCF);
00188 
00189         m_convexPlaneCF->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00190         btAlignedFree( m_convexPlaneCF);
00191         m_planeConvexCF->~btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc();
00192         btAlignedFree( m_planeConvexCF);
00193 
00194         m_pdSolver->~btConvexPenetrationDepthSolver();
00195         
00196         btAlignedFree(m_pdSolver);
00197 
00198 
00199 }
00200 
00201 btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc* btDefaultCollisionConfiguration::getClosestPointsAlgorithmCreateFunc(int proxyType0, int proxyType1)
00202 {
00203 
00204 
00205         if ((proxyType0 == SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE) && (proxyType1 == SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE))
00206         {
00207                 return  m_sphereSphereCF;
00208         }
00209 #ifdef USE_BUGGY_SPHERE_BOX_ALGORITHM
00210         if ((proxyType0 == SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE) && (proxyType1 == BOX_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE))
00211         {
00212                 return  m_sphereBoxCF;
00213         }
00214 
00215         if ((proxyType0 == BOX_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE) && (proxyType1 == SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE))
00216         {
00217                 return  m_boxSphereCF;
00218         }
00219 #endif //USE_BUGGY_SPHERE_BOX_ALGORITHM
00220 
00221 
00222         if ((proxyType0 == SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE) && (proxyType1 == TRIANGLE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE))
00223         {
00224                 return  m_sphereTriangleCF;
00225         }
00226 
00227         if ((proxyType0 == TRIANGLE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE) && (proxyType1 == SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE))
00228         {
00229                 return  m_triangleSphereCF;
00230         }
00231 
00232         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex(proxyType0) && (proxyType1 == STATIC_PLANE_PROXYTYPE))
00233         {
00234                 return m_convexPlaneCF;
00235         }
00236 
00237         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex(proxyType1) && (proxyType0 == STATIC_PLANE_PROXYTYPE))
00238         {
00239                 return m_planeConvexCF;
00240         }
00241 
00242 
00243 
00244         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex(proxyType0) && btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex(proxyType1))
00245         {
00246                 return m_convexConvexCreateFunc;
00247         }
00248 
00249         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex(proxyType0) && btBroadphaseProxy::isConcave(proxyType1))
00250         {
00251                 return m_convexConcaveCreateFunc;
00252         }
00253 
00254         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex(proxyType1) && btBroadphaseProxy::isConcave(proxyType0))
00255         {
00256                 return m_swappedConvexConcaveCreateFunc;
00257         }
00258 
00259 
00260         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isCompound(proxyType0) && btBroadphaseProxy::isCompound(proxyType1))
00261         {
00262                 return m_compoundCompoundCreateFunc;
00263         }
00264 
00265         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isCompound(proxyType0))
00266         {
00267                 return m_compoundCreateFunc;
00268         }
00269         else
00270         {
00271                 if (btBroadphaseProxy::isCompound(proxyType1))
00272                 {
00273                         return m_swappedCompoundCreateFunc;
00274                 }
00275         }
00276 
00277         //failed to find an algorithm
00278         return m_emptyCreateFunc;
00279 
00280 }
00281 
00282 btCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc* btDefaultCollisionConfiguration::getCollisionAlgorithmCreateFunc(int proxyType0,int proxyType1)
00283 {
00284 
00285 
00286 
00287         if ((proxyType0 == SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE) && (proxyType1==SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE))
00288         {
00289                 return  m_sphereSphereCF;
00290         }
00291 #ifdef USE_BUGGY_SPHERE_BOX_ALGORITHM
00292         if ((proxyType0 == SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE) && (proxyType1==BOX_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE))
00293         {
00294                 return  m_sphereBoxCF;
00295         }
00296 
00297         if ((proxyType0 == BOX_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE ) && (proxyType1==SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE))
00298         {
00299                 return  m_boxSphereCF;
00300         }
00301 #endif //USE_BUGGY_SPHERE_BOX_ALGORITHM
00302 
00303 
00304         if ((proxyType0 == SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE ) && (proxyType1==TRIANGLE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE))
00305         {
00306                 return  m_sphereTriangleCF;
00307         }
00308 
00309         if ((proxyType0 == TRIANGLE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE  ) && (proxyType1==SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE))
00310         {
00311                 return  m_triangleSphereCF;
00312         } 
00313 
00314         if ((proxyType0 == BOX_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE) && (proxyType1 == BOX_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE))
00315         {
00316                 return m_boxBoxCF;
00317         }
00318         
00319         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex(proxyType0) && (proxyType1 == STATIC_PLANE_PROXYTYPE))
00320         {
00321                 return m_convexPlaneCF;
00322         }
00323 
00324         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex(proxyType1) && (proxyType0 == STATIC_PLANE_PROXYTYPE))
00325         {
00326                 return m_planeConvexCF;
00327         }
00328         
00329 
00330 
00331         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex(proxyType0) && btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex(proxyType1))
00332         {
00333                 return m_convexConvexCreateFunc;
00334         }
00335 
00336         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex(proxyType0) && btBroadphaseProxy::isConcave(proxyType1))
00337         {
00338                 return m_convexConcaveCreateFunc;
00339         }
00340 
00341         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex(proxyType1) && btBroadphaseProxy::isConcave(proxyType0))
00342         {
00343                 return m_swappedConvexConcaveCreateFunc;
00344         }
00345 
00346 
00347         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isCompound(proxyType0) && btBroadphaseProxy::isCompound(proxyType1))
00348         {
00349                 return m_compoundCompoundCreateFunc;
00350         }
00351 
00352         if (btBroadphaseProxy::isCompound(proxyType0))
00353         {
00354                 return m_compoundCreateFunc;
00355         } else
00356         {
00357                 if (btBroadphaseProxy::isCompound(proxyType1))
00358                 {
00359                         return m_swappedCompoundCreateFunc;
00360                 }
00361         }
00362 
00363         //failed to find an algorithm
00364         return m_emptyCreateFunc;
00365 }

00367 void btDefaultCollisionConfiguration::setConvexConvexMultipointIterations(int numPerturbationIterations, int minimumPointsPerturbationThreshold)
00368 {
00369         btConvexConvexAlgorithm::CreateFunc* convexConvex = (btConvexConvexAlgorithm::CreateFunc*) m_convexConvexCreateFunc;
00370         convexConvex->m_numPerturbationIterations = numPerturbationIterations;
00371         convexConvex->m_minimumPointsPerturbationThreshold = minimumPointsPerturbationThreshold;
00372 }
00373 
00374 void    btDefaultCollisionConfiguration::setPlaneConvexMultipointIterations(int numPerturbationIterations, int minimumPointsPerturbationThreshold)
00375 {
00376         btConvexPlaneCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc* cpCF = (btConvexPlaneCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc*)m_convexPlaneCF;
00377         cpCF->m_numPerturbationIterations = numPerturbationIterations;
00378         cpCF->m_minimumPointsPerturbationThreshold = minimumPointsPerturbationThreshold;
00379         
00380         btConvexPlaneCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc* pcCF = (btConvexPlaneCollisionAlgorithm::CreateFunc*)m_planeConvexCF;
00381         pcCF->m_numPerturbationIterations = numPerturbationIterations;
00382         pcCF->m_minimumPointsPerturbationThreshold = minimumPointsPerturbationThreshold;
00383 }
